pages.text: I got an epiphany on how to create potions after I created a questionable potion. The first of the ideas is to create a healing potion. Recipe: [empty, crystal phial, bottle of honey, sunflower, chamomile, empty].
The second idea is how to create an oak leather potion that protects against damage. Recipe: [empty, crystal phial, acorn, obsidian, leather, empty].
The third idea is to create a potion of cat vision, because in the dark monsters are not visible! Recipe: [empty, crystal phial, star moss, thistle, glowstone dust, empty].

The fourth thought, since at any moment someone may appear in the cave, you need to create a hurry potion to dig faster. Recipe: [empty, crystal phial, silver sage, golden pickaxe, golden carrot, empty]. REAGENT - Entropy potion
